title: Thomas Carlyle - "On the same ground" comparison

content.question: The author uses the phrase "On the same ground" (Paragraph 1) to set up a comparison between

choices.label: conceptually powerful writers and exemplary educators
intellectual challenges faced by writers and those faced by readers
the formulation of solutions and the identification of problems

content.answer: conceptually powerful writers and exemplary educators

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
